episodes.title: The Ant Hill Kids: The Most Disturbing Cult You’ve Never Heard Of
episodes.description:
Today we’re diving into The Ant Hill Kids — a secluded, brutal cult led by Roch Thériault, hidden deep in the Canadian wilderness. What happened inside this so-called “community” is almost too dark to believe… but the survivors’ stories deserve to be told.

If you’re into true crime deep dives, disturbing cult history, or learning the real events behind infamous cases, this video is for you.
